name: Uniunihan-DB
description: This project started as a method for finding classical Chinese cognates, and morphed into a learners' dictionary of Chinese, Japanese, Korean and Vietnamese.

name: Kengdic
description: A 130,000 entry Korean/English dictionary originally created by Joe Speigle. After the author's passing, I located the original data and retrofitted it with QA scripts and automated tests to help clean and validate it. I hope to make it a high quality, full-coverage, living dictionary.

name: Modern Algorithmic Toolbox Assignments
description: Highly detailed Jupyter notebooks exploring the asignments of the incredible Stanford course, The Modern Algorithm Toolbox. The assignments explore topics in randomized algorithms and data analysis.
